xmbean.description:
WebView Service
Provides a Service to launch a DICOM Viewer web application (applet).
.

attribute.description: Called AET (AET to get SOP Instance UIDS via C-FIND).
attribute.name: CalledAET

attribute.description: Hostname or IP address of called AE.
attribute.name: Host

attribute.description: Applet Class. Full qualified class name of viewer applet.
attribute.name: AppletClass

attribute.description: Applet Archive. Jar file containing applet class. Path relative to this WebView URL.
attribute.name: AppletArchive

attribute.description:
List of applet parameters with fixed values.
Format:<parametername>=<value>
Separate multible parameters with ';' or newline.
attribute.name: setAppletParameterMap

attribute.description:
List of applet parameters with values from DICOM attributes.
Format:<parametername>=<tag>
<tag>:Use either the attribute name as defined in dictionary or the hex value
e.g. 'PatientName' or '00100010'
Separate multible parameters with ';' or newline.
Use NONE to disable this list.
attribute.name: Result2ParameterMap

attribute.description:
Class name of a custom class to add customized launch properties.
This Class must implement the CustomLaunchProperties interface.
Use NONE if no customization is necessary.
attribute.name: CustomLaunchPropertiesClass

attribute.description:
List of image SOP Classes that are included in the image UID list(s).
Use either the SOP Class UID value, or the name specified in DICOM Part 6, Annex A Registry of DICOM unique identifiers, concatenating individual words without spaces.
attribute.name: ImageSOPClasses

value.value: ComputedRadiographyImageStorage DigitalXRayImageStorageForPresentation DigitalXRayImageStorageForProcessing DigitalMammographyXRayImageStorageForPresentation DigitalMammographyXRayImageStorageForProcessing DigitalIntraoralXRayImageStorageForPresentation DigitalIntraoralXRayImageStorageForProcessing CTImageStorage EnhancedCTImageStorage UltrasoundMultiframeImageStorage MRImageStorage EnhancedMRImageStorage UltrasoundImageStorage SecondaryCaptureImageStorage MultiframeSingleBitSecondaryCaptureImageStorage MultiframeGrayscaleByteSecondaryCaptureImageStorage MultiframeGrayscaleWordSecondaryCaptureImageStorage MultiframeTrueColorSecondaryCaptureImageStorage XRayAngiographicImageStorage XRayRadiofluoroscopicImageStorage NuclearMedicineImageStorage VLEndoscopicImageStorage VLMicroscopicImageStorage VLSlideCoordinatesMicroscopicImageStorage VLPhotographicImageStorage OphthalmicPhotography8BitImageStorage OphthalmicPhotography16BitImageStorage PositronEmissionTomographyImageStorage RTImageStorage HardcopyGrayscaleImageStorageSOPClassRetired HardcopyColorImageStorageSOPClassRetired NuclearMedicineImageStorageRetired UltrasoundMultiframeImageStorageRetired UltrasoundImageStorageRetired XRayAngiographicBiPlaneImageStorageRetired

attribute.description:
List of SOP Classes that are used for Presentation States.
Use either the SOP Class UID value, or the name specified in DICOM Part 6, Annex A Registry of DICOM unique identifiers, concatenating individual words without spaces.
attribute.name: PresentationStateCUIDs

attribute.description:
Config String to get parameter for List of SOPInstanceUIDs per series.
Format:<parametername>|<descr>|<descrValue>|<list seperator>|< uid seperator>|<postfix>
descrValue: either value from a DICOM attribute (e.g. 0008103E or SeriesDescription) or a numbering (#, #-1 or #a -> 1,2,3,.. 0,1,2,.. or a,b,c,.. )
e.g.:SEQUENCE|Seq. Nr.|0008103E|;|;| --> SEQUENCE1="Seq. Nr.[seriesdescr];[UID1];[UID2]"
attribute.name: ParaSeriesInstances

attribute.description:
Config String to get parameter for List of presentation states.
Format:<parametername>|<descr>|<descrValue>|<list seperator>|< uid seperator>|<postfix>
descrValue: either value from a DICOM attribute (e.g. 0008103E or SeriesDescription) or a numbering (#, #-1 or #a -> 1,2,3,.. 0,1,2,.. or a,b,c,.. )
e.g.:PR_UIDS||||;| --> PR_UIDS="[UID1];[UID2]"
attribute.name: ParaPresentationStates

attribute.description: Ignore Presentation States if viewer is called with study level (studyUID or accNr).
attribute.name: IgnorePresentationStateForStudies

attribute.description: Enable Selection of Presentation States if study contains more than one Presentation State.
attribute.name: enableSelectionOfPresentationState

operation.description:
Get the Applet Parameters to launch the web based DICOM viewer.
Get SOP Instance UIDs for given Accession Number.
If the C-FIND response contains entries from different patient,
only entries of the first patient are taken into account.
operation.name: getLaunchPropertiesForAccNr

parameter.description:
Enable selection of Presentation State if study contains more than one PR.
In this case the result contains selection parameters (key=InstanceUID, value=Description) instead of APPLET PARAMs.
If selectPR is null the value of enableSelectionOfPresentationState is used as default.
parameter.name: selectPR

operation.description:
Get the Applet Parameters to launch the web based DICOM viewer.
Get SOP Instance UIDs for given Study Instance UID.
operation.name: getLaunchPropertiesForStudyUID

parameter.description:
Enable selection of Presentation State if study contains more than one PR.
In this case the result contains selection parameters (key=InstanceUID, value=Description) instead of APPLET PARAMs.
If selectPR is null the value of enableSelectionOfPresentationState is used as default.
parameter.name: selectPR

operation.description:
Get the Applet Parameters to launch the web based DICOM viewer.
Get SOP Instance UIDs for given Series Instance UID.
operation.name: getLaunchPropertiesForSeriesUID

parameter.description:
Enable selection of Presentation State if study contains more than one PR.
In this case the result contains selection parameters (key=InstanceUID, value=Description) instead of APPLET PARAMs.
If selectPR is null the value of enableSelectionOfPresentationState is used as default.
parameter.name: selectPR

operation.description:
Get the Applet Parameters to launch the web based DICOM viewer.
Get SOP Instance UIDs referenced by given Presentation State.
operation.name: getLaunchPropertiesForPresentationState
